A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Nothing can save a poorly written film. From start to finish this film was a disaster of epic proportions. Childish humor\, wasteful plot lines \,no real new character connections made\, no backstories\, sloppy sloppy directing. The acting is fine\, driver is totally underutilized for the kind of talent he is. No trilogy is perfect\, hopefully JJ can save the saga.(again)Only time will tell.
